name: Mechanaut Scramble
description:
OH NO! YOUR TEMPORAL DRIVE BROKE AND THE SHIP IS DYING. FIND A WAY TO FIX THIS BEFORE TIME RUNS.. OUT?

Time loops! Run out of time and fail? Thats ok!

Mini worlds! Three small worlds to explore.

Survive!

LMB Shoot

WASD Move

Made for the Quad Jam #3

Super scuff!

By Vampexx and Maxwell

Music:

Hellish Revenge by Weeppiko
